programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: A kid has the ability to turn into Shazam, an adult superhero. But he needs to master his powers quickly to fight the deadly forces of evil.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: Ben Affleck stars as a math savant whose calm, bespectacled exterior as an accountant hides his work for some dangerous criminal organizations.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Chinese-American New Yorker Rachel Chu travels to Singapore with her boyfriend Nick to attend his best friend's wedding. Before long, his secret is out: Nick's family is wealthy, and he's considered the most eligible bachelor in Asia…

programme.title: Cash Out
programme.desc: Mason Goddard is a world class master-thief. Believing he has pulled off the perfect heist, his plan is foiled and now he must match wits with a sexy FBI investigator.

programme.title: Expend4Bles
programme.desc: The Expendables - original and new - are on a mission, this time to Qadhafi’s old chemical weapons plant in Libya to intercept Suharato Rahmat, on his own solo operation to steal nuclear missile detonators for his wicked client, Ocelot.

programme.title: Monkey Man
programme.desc: An underground fight club worker seeks vengeance against the corrupt leaders who murdered his mother and continue to prey on the powerless.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: A wickedly dark comedy about dominatrix, Rebecca and her wealthy client Hal. A battle of wills ensues over the course of one incredibly fraught night, with both struggling to keep the upper hand as the power dynamics swing wildly back and forth.

programme.title: The Visitor
programme.desc: A man must discover the true identity of his doppelgänger.

programme.title: Super/Man: The Christopher Reeve Story
programme.desc: Never-before-seen home movies and personal archives recount the tragic and redemptive story of actor and activist Christopher Reeve.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: When Jerry moves into the best hotel in New York on the eve of the wedding of the century, the event planner hires Tom to get rid of him. However, the ensuing cat and mouse battle threatens to destroy her career, the wedding and possibly the hotel.

programme.title: North Country
programme.desc: A single mother retaliates against her male co-workers in an iron mine, leading to the first class-action lawsuit for sexual discrimination in America.

programme.title: It'S Complicated
programme.desc: In matters of love, divorce, and everything in between, it's, well, It's Complicated.

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: It was love at first site for Jonathan and Kate but fate kept them apart for years. Now both, on the verge of marriage, decide to reverse fate.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A baby and his 7-year old brother try to stop an evil CEO.

programme.title: 10,000 Bc
programme.desc: A young mammoth hunter leads a band of hunters to rescue his love in this prehistoric epic.

programme.title: Godzilla X Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: The ultimate Titan team-up! Godzilla and Kong face a colossal threat from Hollow World, challenging their very existence - and our own.

programme.title: What Happens Later
programme.desc: Two ex-lovers, Bill and Willa, get snowed in at a regional airport overnight. Indefinitely delayed, Willa, a magical thinker, and Bill, a catastrophic one, find themselves just as attracted to and annoyed by one another as they did decades earlier. But as they unpack the riddle of their mutual past and compare their lives to the dreams they once shared, they begin to wonder if their reunion is mere coincidence, or something more enchanted.

programme.title: Respect
programme.desc: The life story of legendary R&B singer, Aretha Franklin.

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: A mysterious man named Smith delivers a baby during a shootout and is then called upon to protect the newborn from ruthless criminals out to kill it.

programme.title: Body Of Lies
programme.desc: Trust can be as dangerous as it is necessary for survival in this bold spy thriller about CIA’s hunt for the mastermind of terrorist attacks.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes Of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Grindelwald escapes custody and Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander, who agrees to help, unaware of the dangers that lie ahead.

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: It was love at first site for Jonathan and Kate but fate kept them apart for years. Now both, on the verge of marriage, decide to reverse fate.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A baby and his 7-year old brother try to stop an evil CEO.

programme.title: Respect
programme.desc: The life story of legendary R&B singer, Aretha Franklin.

programme.title: 10,000 Bc
programme.desc: A young mammoth hunter leads a band of hunters to rescue his love in this prehistoric epic.

programme.title: Paw Patrol: The Mighty Movie
programme.desc: A magical meteor lands in Adventure City and transforms the PAW Patrol pups into The MIGHTY PUPS.

programme.title: The Devil'S Deal
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Two brothers separated at birth reunite 30 years later and go on a road trip in search of their mom with Alzheimer's.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: I, The Executioner
programme.desc: Detective Seo Do-cheol and rookie Park Sun-woo join forces to investigate a professor's murder linked to past cases. As they pursue a suspected serial killer, the culprit releases teasers online, escalating public panic. The Major Crimes team races against time to stop the killer's next strike.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep7
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep8
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Enemies In-Law
programme.desc: Chul-soo, the son of notorious criminals, falls for Young-hee, a detective. To win her father's approval, he vows to pass the police exam. As their wedding approaches, his parents try to sabotage his future while Young-hee investigates a serial murder case, and Chul-soo uses his family's skills to help.

programme.title: Because I Love You
programme.desc: After an accident, a talented songwriter transforms into a messenger of love by connecting people who having trouble finding love and expressing their feelings.

programme.title: Taeyong: Ty Track In Cinemas
programme.desc: Taeyong is the first NCT member to make a solo debut. He released a mini album and held a 2-day concert. Witness his outstanding performance and take a closer look at him behind the stage.

programme.title: The Terror, Live
programme.desc: A newsman discovers he's been rigged with a bomb after he has an exclusive interview with a terrorist who blew up a bridge.

programme.title: The King'S Letters
programme.desc: King Sejong desires to create an original alphabet for his people. With the help of others, they struggle to create the Korean alphabet Hangul.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she’s often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy – Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he’s forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss’s fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a “former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility” using only the four phone calls they’ve been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it’s complicated when Tina’s new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez’s undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canada’s most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she’s not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pat Pat and the pirates have fallen out over who has won board game and as they've lost the rules they can't agree. They both think they are the winner and refuse to talk to one another. Noddy needs to find the missing rules or they might never be friends again! Noddy launches his investigation and asking the who, what, where, when, why and how questions he follows the clues and eventually finds the rules in Smartysaurus's dinolab. They were blown there by the wind from the Daisy Mill at the farm. Now the pirates and Pat-Pat can agree on who has won the game and are friends again. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Frederic makes a play to take over the town's babysitters by instituting "senior sitting"

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Bucket and Mulch accidentally discover a Skrill, and its up to the gang to save it from the Beserkers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When the Party Crashers invade Troll Village, they trap Poppy and Branch, party throughout the village, and challenge the Trolls to a dramatic sing-off

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Rumors of scary sea monsters in the East End take the kids on a journey of discovering you shouldn’t believe everything you hear. / Mysterious globs disturbing the ocean turn out to be the byproduct of food from Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: It’s another adventure with Tag and Scooch dressed up as their favorite comic book characters: Chaser and Chewer! But this time, bad guy Thunder (Frank) is asking for their help, because Flea (Beans) is trying to take over the town on his own. / When Tag and Scooch find out Wagnes has always dreamt of becoming a famous country music singer, they decide to make her dream come true.

programme.title: Go Dog Go!
programme.desc: Mayor Sniffington mixed up the dates for the Dogcathalon and it turns out it’s being held today! Panicked, Tag and Scooch rush off to make sure the three race spots are race ready so they can be approved by the Top Dog. / The Dogcathalon Race has officially started! Tag goes into Crew Chief mode, running around to ensure Team Pawston is ready for each part of the race. But with Sam unable to race, he encourages Tag to take his place and win it all for Pawston.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: While the others care for baby dragons at the roost, Dak, Winger, Burple and Aggro come face-to-face with a grumpy old dragon on a dangerous island.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders plan to team up with the Slinkwings when an angry Grumblegard threatens Huttsgalor. But their old enemies may be up to new tricks.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: Blade tells Po the truth about Alfie. The group chases after Klaus and Veruca in an epic snowy mountain chase, culminating in Po saving Blade’s life as the weasels take off with the gauntlet and the whip. Rukhmini reveals that she actually has the real whip in her staff, and she knows where to go to get the next one: India.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When time is running out for Puss to find the Obelisk, he must fight El Moco and finds out who The One from the Great Prophecy is

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Puss is dealing with the apparent loss of Dulcinea, the mighty fear-eating Bloodwolf arrives and brings out Puss's greatest fears

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free

programme.desc: A psychotic killer masquerades as an ice cream man in order to get closer to the objects of his affection.

programme.title: The Boy

programme.desc: A cop relies on a young car thief to take down four gangsters who plan to rob a rich merchant

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she’s often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: The kids go on a training mission on Dragon Island, where Hiccup runs into an old enemy – Dagur!

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: Snotlout is concerned when his dragon’s flame goes out and the kids have to figure out how to reignite it before it’s too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he’s forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss’s fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a “former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility” using only the four phone calls they’ve been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it’s complicated when Tina’s new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez’s undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canada’s most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she’s not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. Unfortunately Brad's luxury private ship has broken down en route so Pat and Jess must head out to sea in the SDS boat and collect him. Meanwhile Julian, Meera, Bill and Sarah are on the train to Pencaster Bay with their mums to watch the concert. The kids enter into a cacophonous ‘sing off' to decide who is the best singer. Pat and Jess collect Brad Lee from his ship only to find that he's afraid of small boats! Pat heads to shore as quickly as possible but unfortunately gets diverted to pick up a poorly puffin from Chris beacon at the lighthouse. Back at the Pencaster Bay the kids competitiveness leads to a dance off against the mums, who do surprisingly well. Pat finally manages to get the poorly puffin ashore to be treated by Amy the vet and Brad Lee goes on to perform a blistering concert by the seaside!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Pat Pat and the pirates have fallen out over who has won board game and as they've lost the rules they can't agree. They both think they are the winner and refuse to talk to one another. Noddy needs to find the missing rules or they might never be friends again! Noddy launches his investigation and asking the who, what, where, when, why and how questions he follows the clues and eventually finds the rules in Smartysaurus's dinolab. They were blown there by the wind from the Daisy Mill at the farm. Now the pirates and Pat-Pat can agree on who has won the game and are friends again. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has been so busy helping everybody else she hasn't had time to tidy her own garden. Bumble asks the other tots to help him tidy his best friend's garden as a surprise for Fifi

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: The world's three best pilots are partnered with a state-of-the-art, fully-automated, pilotless, super stealth warplane - inhuman and invincible. But once in the air, it goes haywire, leaving them with one final mission - bring it down.

programme.title: Ali

programme.title: Got The Spot in Gyeongbuk

Through the eyes of foreign influencers who thrive on social media, we aim to showcase the unique charm of different regions and generate a wealth of engaging content in this groundbreaking travel initiative!

programme.title: Music Bank K-Chart

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.desc: An unknown spirit lurks in the empty hallways of Ohio's Higginsport School. Is it evidence of a darker haunting caused by recent deaths on the property?

programme.title: Extreme Rvs (S2)

programme.title: Mountain Monsters (S3)
programme.desc: The AIMS team learns that a mysterious creature known as the Black Wolf roams the Dark Forest.

programme.title: Expedition X (S4)
programme.desc: The team explore a haunted forest near the site of the Dracula legend. During a night investigation, Jess is watched by someone or something sinister.

programme.title: Extreme Rvs (S2)
programme.desc: A rodeo star gets an epic travel trailer with room for his family and four horses. And, an amazing toy hauler with a garage and tailgate patio is built.

programme.title: Masamang Ugat
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated after their mother dies. One becomes a cop (Mikey Arroyo), the other an assassin (Ace Vergel). The cop ambitiously wants to bring down a drug lord supported by politicians, while the assassin works for the same drug lord.

programme.title: Kita Kita
programme.desc: A film about a working Filipino woman working as travel guide in Sapporo, Japan who was driven to blindness due to extreme stress and heartache. While living alone, she found comfort in the company of a fellow Filipino whom served as her eyes during her times of temporary blindness

programme.title: Diary ng Panget
programme.desc: Eya (Nadine Lustre) and Cross (James Reid) didn't get along at first, their relationship becomes complicated but soon, they fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Golden Divas
programme.desc: Watch as they take you back to the glorious ’60s and ’70s. Pilita Corales "Asia’s Queen of Song", Carmen Pateña dubbed as the "Shirley Bassey of the Philippines", and Carmen Soriano will render their signature songs.

programme.title: Sana All
programme.desc: Iyam (Meg Imperial), granddaughter of Lola Ingga, a renowned tapuey maker in the town of Adams. Iyam is about to take over their tapuey business, but the wine that she makes doesn't meet her grandma’s standard.

programme.title: Dos Ekis
programme.desc: Benito met Charisse, a stripper and he immediately falls in love with her. Unknown to Benito, Charisse took a bag, which contained a large sum of money. Soon, the syndicate goes after them and their boring lives were never the same again

programme.title: Paligayahin Mo Ako
programme.desc: Susan and Zeny are sisters who have long endured their father's uselessness. Together with their mother, they have struggled to keep their family afloat by raising ducks.

programme.title: Full Moon
programme.desc: A young girl (Barbie Forteza) has her first brush with romance. Unluckily for her, her paramour (Derrick Monasterio) bears a dark, monstrous secret that will soon prove to be a challenge for their young love.

programme.title: Ang Pahina
programme.desc: Because of Mira’s (Kiray Celis) determination to convinced her loved one study, she, together with her mother Linda, Mang Johnny and Paul all have graduated with flying colors with the help of DepEd’s Alternative Learning System.

programme.title: Nuuk
programme.desc: Elaisa (Alice Dixson) is a Filipino widow who lives in Nuuk with her rebellious adult son Karl. She meets a visiting Filipino seaman Mark (Aga Muhlach). He is friendly and caring. But a blizzard is threatening to cause more havoc in her life.

programme.title: Talk Back and You're Dead
programme.desc: This is a story of Samantha Perez (Nadine Lustre), a girl who unbelievably fell in love with a delinquent, hot-headed guy named Timothy Odelle Pendleton aka Top (James Reid), the leader of the gang, Lucky 13.

programme.title: Won't Last A Day Without You
programme.desc: DJ Heidee (Sarah Geronimo) provides love advice to people who are having problems in their relationships. In the process of getting Melissa and Andrew together, Heidee begin to feel an attraction toward Andrew.

programme.title: Magbuwag Ta Kay
programme.desc: "Magbuwag Ta Kay" (Let's Break Up, Kay) revolves around college sweethearts Roy (Rowell Ucat) and Kay (Akiko Solon), who have to come to terms of their looming breakup.

programme.title: Columbo S6 E03 - Bye-Bye… I.Q. Murder
programme.desc: Los Angeles homicide detective Lieutenant Columbo uses his humble ways and ingenuous demeanor to winkle out even the most well-concealed of crimes.However, beneath all that comical exterior was probably the most dogged investigator in the Los Angeles Police Department.

programme.title: Married With Children S1 E10 - Poker Game, The
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married… With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: CSI S3 E10 - High and Low
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Stephen King's IT E02 - Part II
programme.desc: IT rises from dank, dark places. IT preys on children. IT knows exactly what scares you--and IT never goes away.

programme.title: The Waltons S1 E06 - The Star
programme.desc: From the Great Depression to World War II, an American family living in the Blue Ridge Mountains of Virginia struggles to remain together in this heartwarming series, the winner of 13 Emmy Awards, that chronicles the lives of a people poor in material wealth but rich in spirit.

programme.title: Stephen King's IT E03 - Part III
programme.desc: IT rises from dank, dark places. IT preys on children. IT knows exactly what scares you--and IT never goes away.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the remaining survivalists near day 50, conditions at Reindeer Lake intensify. Desperation rises as the temperatures continue to drop, and personal demons bubble to the surface.

programme.title: Swamp People: Serpent Invasion (S3)
programme.desc: Troy and Pickle track a high-tech snake. Bill and Tes search for a new hot spot. Dusty discovers one of his favourite honey holes has changed forever. Zak and Bruce chase the snakes and get a surprise.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: During the Civil War, a daring prison break frees hundreds of Union soldiers. When he was captured and sent to Libby Prison in Richmond, Virginia, he engineered one of the greatest mass escapes in history.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24)
programme.desc: When a seller strolls in with a collection of action figures signed by the cast of 'The Walking Dead', will Chum bite? Then, Corey is too cool when a 'Rock n Roll High School' poster comes into the shop.

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: From the lightbulb to the automobile, these innovations changed the world. Host Peyton Manning unveils the top ten inventions of all time, as voted on by a panel of experts.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: Four bladesmiths face double the trouble when they are tasked with forging not one, but two canister damascus knives. After a round of testing, only two smiths move forward to build a Cinquedea sword.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: The three remaining survivalists brace themselves for the fight to the finish. One participant finds it impossible to stay warm, while others risk it all on the ice. Only one can claim the $500,000 prize.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: The twisted origin stories of some of history's most diabolically creative, and brutal, torture devices—from the Iron Maiden to the pear of anguish.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: An exploration into the dark art of spycraft. From the frankenkitty to the umbrella gun, we'll reveal the deadliest spy weapons deployed to gather information and assassinate enemies.

programme.title: Diligan Man Ng Dugo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo is an idealistic Army Captain who believes in the government's reform programs for the people of Mindanao. In fact, he is in constant dialogue with different Muslim hardliners regarding the matter.

programme.title: Ang Kuya Kong Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).

programme.title: Bituing Walang Ningning (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A tale about an avid fan that attained her dream of someday becoming a bigger star than her idol.

programme.title: Minsan May Pangarap
programme.desc: This is the true story of Aldo Guce and his family, and how they stood upand won against bigotry and the American system of justice. Based on a well-publicized case known among Filipinos in the United States.

programme.title: Dos Bravos
programme.desc: Pancho (Niño Muhlach) is travelling from one town to the next in the hope of finding his long lost father. His only clue is a handkerchief embroidered with an emblem of Hacienda BM. Later, Pancho ask the help of Valdes (Dante Varona).

programme.title: Pandoy... Alalay Ni Panday
programme.desc: In Pandoy, Joey De Leon gave a comic twist to the popular "Panday," a fictional action hero popularized by the King himself, Fernando Poe, Jr.

programme.title: Isang Tanong, Isang Sagot
programme.desc: Jason played the role of a rich and bratty student who fell in love with one of his maids, played by the lovely Donna Cruz. Surprised at the turn of events, he tried to hide his feelings by being unkind to the girl.

programme.title: Sana Dalawa Ang Puso Ko
programme.desc: A young man who was engaged to be married found himself attracted to another woman. Lacking the nerve to call off the wedding, he went through with the ceremony hopeful that his bride would give him the strength to avoid his other love.

programme.title: May Daga Sa Labas ng Lungga
programme.desc: In this sequel to the highly successful "May Lamok sa Loob ng Kulambo", it is now Lauro's (Eddie Garcia) turn to doubt his wife Ellen's (Gloria Diaz) fidelity.

programme.title: Codename: Palaban
programme.desc: Coming from different social backgrounds and of different ideologies, this group of women are made to undergo special training course in exchange for suspended jail sentences.

programme.title: Sgt. Miguel Carpio: Multiple Murder
programme.desc: An exemplary policeman dedicates so much time to his duties that his wife begins to feel neglected.

programme.title: Campus Beat
programme.desc: The 15-year old Aga personifies the young man of the times. He is living a normal teen-age life, doing a balancing act between his separated parents, his family and his friends, his studies and his love for music and the beginnings of young love.

programme.title: Oras-Oras, Araw-Araw
programme.desc: Jessa Rodriguez (Sharon Cuneta), a successful TV personality whose top rating show features ugly stories of poverty and hardships. She sympathizes with her subjects but it all ends there, until she meets one lady in a club.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco and Caroline Hyde in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: Philanthropist and financier David Rubenstein uncovers inside stories from the most influential minds in business.

programme.title: Bloomberg Studio 1.0
programme.desc: Roblox CEO & Co-Founder David Baszucki. Bloomberg talks to David Baszucki about the success of the online gaming platform, Roblox.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
programme.desc: From New York, the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
programme.desc: Analysing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hearing from the biggest newsmakers, and showcasing the unrivalled expertise of Bloomberg News.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance of Power

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: What'd You Miss?

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: From Hong Kong, the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Clash Of The Titans
programme.desc: In CLASH OF THE TITANS, the ultimate struggle for power pits men against kings and kings against gods. But the war between the gods themselves could destroy the world. Sam Worthington (Terminator Salvation, Avatar) stars as the Greek hero Perseus in this spectacular retelling of the classic myth (and '80s cult classic film). Born of a god, but raised as a man, Perseus is helpless to save his family from the clutches of Hades (Oscar nominee Ralph Fiennes -- Harry Potter films), the vengeful god of the underworld. With nothing left to lose, he volunteers to lead a dangerous mission to defeat Hades before he can seize power from Zeus (Oscar nominee Liam Neeson -- Batman Begins) and unleash hell on earth. With a daring band of warriors, Perseus sets off on a perilous journey deep into forbidden worlds. Battling unholy demons and fearsome beasts, he will triumph only if he can accept his power as a god, defy his fate and create his own destiny.

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders - Ian Hamm

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: The Big Country
programme.desc: A New England sea captain in the 1880s arrives at his fiancée's sprawling Texas ranch, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

programme.title: Guns Of The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Gunslinger Chris Adams is hired by a Mexican revolutionary to organize the rescue of his cause's leader from a brutal Army prison.

programme.title: The Lion In Winter
programme.desc: To find a successor, King Henry II summons to court his three sons and wife, who he has kept imprisoned for the last 10 years. The powerfully destructive relationship of the family erupts as they scheme and cajole to determine who will be the future king.

programme.title: Singapore Tonight

programme.title: Karikal Mahal: A Silent Witness

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: The spirit of a departed child leaves its handprint on a couple's mirror. A ghost takes control of a willing paranormal investigator's neck. A woman spots what appears to be a mermaid in a local lake.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: When a teenager is found shot and dumped in the street, detectives struggle to figure out who he is and where he was killed.

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: After Derrick Todd Lee was arrested, police were able to connect him to other cold cases. Baton Rouge had approximately 60 unsolved cases of missing or murdered women from the previous 10 years.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A man risks his life to save his wife during a home invasion; two convenience store workers defend their workplace; a hairdresser is put in an unpredictable situation; and more.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A prison librarian is held hostage by a desperate inmate who holds a shank to his neck; a motorcyclist and his girlfriend are attacked in the street; a porch pirate is busted; and more.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: On 24th September 2019, 20-year-old Tashan Daniel is on his way to watch his beloved Arsenal FC play Nottingham Forest, but a brutal attack at the train station ends the talented athlete's hopes.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight (S1)
programme.desc: In April 1993, 35-year-old businesswoman Debbie Buxton is walking her dogs on her local riverbank when she crosses paths with David Bond, who has a history of unprovoked attacks on female strangers.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A woman faces life in prison when a passenger in the car she is driving is killed after she collides with an 18-wheel truck. Was she an intoxicated driver, or was it a tragic accident?

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A traveling nurse is pulled over for a traffic violation in New Mexico and is arrested for felony burglary carried out in her home state of Ohio. Is she a thug for hire or innocent with a rock-solid alibi?

programme.desc: In Gwinnett County, a beloved rapper is gunned down in a hail of bullets from a drive-by shooting. With little hard evidence, detectives and prosecutors need to rely on a tipster to testify.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cédric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Quartier Recherché
programme.desc: Corey and Evelyne are in search of a rare gem for Guylaine, who has moved to Toronto for her work. Despite the sky-high prices, she's looking for somewhere closer to the city centre. She visits two different properties, on in Old Toronto and one in Liberty Village.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Api !
programme.desc: As Api grew up, she became less shy and made friends with Éric and Fatou. But this year at school, she will have to face a new problem: her friends are mad at her. How can she repair this bond she thought was stronger than anything?

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix squashes a very special pizza prepared by Chief. To avoid being sent to prison, she blames it on an imaginary giant invented by Hatter.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires
programme.desc: A key personality from the world of politics, economics, trade unions... answers questions from the regional press on local, national and international current affairs.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Adieu Berthe - L'Enterrement De Mémé
programme.desc: Armand is kept on his toes by his pharmacy and his passion for magic. Sentimentally, he is torn between his wife, Hélène, and his mistress, Alix, and also has to juggle with his father who has Alzheimer's and his busybody mother-in-law. When his grandmother passes away, he is rapidly overwhelmed.

programme.title: Court Métrage
programme.desc: Court Métrage

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Anémone still doesn't know whether her illness is hereditary, but Lise tries to persuade her to hire a private detective to track down her children. Despite the love she feels for him, Maryse continues to investigate the women featured in Vincent's notebook.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: Going to see her neurologist alone, Anémone receives the results of her genetic test. She announces the result to her children Karla, Simon and Olivia. Caroline learns that fingerprints have been found on the rifle she'd discovered in her childhood home.

programme.title: Éthique Helvétique
programme.desc: Éthique Helvétique

programme.title: Tant Que Le Soleil Frappe
programme.desc: Max, a committed and persistent landscaper, has been working on a wild garden project in an impoverished district in Marseille. After years of refusal, his proposal reaches the final of an architecture contest.

programme.title: Sauvage
programme.desc: 2043. The Mediterranean Sea. Mélissa, accompanied by her dog, works on the ''Rainbow'', her connected yacht. The young woman sells the plastic she collects to the global recycling exchange. One day she saves a little monkey from drowning. An encounter that changes her life.

programme.title: Nature Morte
programme.desc: Juliette, a policeman, joins her father Rimbaud, a farmer, in a field. One of his cows has been killed and butchered in the night. The young woman will lead the investigation.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'Économie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires
programme.desc: A key personality from the world of politics, economics, trade unions... answers questions from the regional press on local, national and international current affairs.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and Sid try to get Yoon Kwan's autograph and Carlota helps Alisa prepare for the Great Lakes City Music Festival!

programme.title: The Really Loud House
programme.desc: On the quest to give Charlie the perfect gift to remember him by Lincoln and his family put all of their talents on the line for the first ever Loud-a-palooza to save Flip's food and fuel.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. After Chloe expresses her anger toward her siblings, they realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now that they're guardians.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: ShoutOut has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to sell a movie to Hollywood bigshot Deuce Van Nuys, but when her mind goes blank under the pressure, the rest of Danger Force pitch in and share their own epic--and epically bad--movie ideas.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: When Henry’s mom has her purse stolen, Captain Man decides he should move in with Henry’s family in order to protect them. Soon, Captain Man takes on a fatherly role which becomes more than Henry likes.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: A villain’s 'dream beam' traps Henry in a crazy dream state that only Charlotte can rescue him from.

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.desc: Lori and Lincoln visit the city. Lori struggles to be a city girl and Lincoln finds Ronnie Anne has changed. // The family has a new plan to dodge Luan's April Fool's Day pranking: stunt doubles

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

programme.desc: Human girl, Clawdeen, follows her instincts and discovers Monster High!/When Clawdeen isn't allowed into Monster High because she's human, she devises other ways to get into school

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: When Draculaura secretly practices witchcraft, Clawdeen and Frankie help subdue the tater she brings to life. // Frankie needs help from Clawdeen and Draculaura to solve an ominous mystery of one of their brains' past lives.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Young Dylan
programme.desc: Dylan receives disappointing news and finds out that true self-confidence comes from within and shouldn't compromise relationships. Rebecca learns when it comes to creativity sometimes less is more.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: A shocked Jennie shows the others what she's witnessed at the Academy and they come up with a plan to un-brainwash Anika. Meanwhile, Evie still can't remember Florian, although her suspicions about him are starting to re-surface.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: When Taylor discovers a bottle containing Uncle Charlie's old mobile phone, with a mysterious text message, the gang are lead to a deserted island with a threatening fog and a piratical past connected to Meesha's family.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Bunny's mother visits from the old country. // Granny Tentacles gets her own spin-off show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Lady Upturn introduces Squidward, and his musical "talents", to her high society friends after she becomes his patron. // Squidward sets out to prove that aliens aren't real...until he has a close encounter of his own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob experiences a bad luck streak when his lucky tie clip suddenly goes missing. // When Patrick can't fall asleep, he seeks assistance from the Sandman.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: After the Science Scouts begin selling biscuits to fund a trip to Mars, Mr. Krabs joins the ring and turns it into a competition. // When a competitor threatens to shut down Mrs. Puff's boating school, she must rely on SpongeBob to stay in business.
